metadata.title: CVE-2022-24958 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
drivers/usb/gadget/legacy/inode.c in the Linux kernel through 5.16.8mishandles dev->buf release.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-24958` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-229-generic - 4.4.0-229.263
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-229-generic - 4.4.0-229.263
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-229-lowlatency - 4.4.0-229.263
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
